metadata.title: CVE-2023-20593 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description: An issue in “Zen 2” CPUs, under specific microarchitectural circumstances,may allow an attacker to potentially access sensitive information.

criterions.comment: amd64-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
